title: Mayura Emerald Pendant - Adda (అడ్డ) with Diamond Embellishments
features: Intricate filigree design inspired by peacock (Mayura) motifs. Features two facing peacocks flanking the central Emerald. Diamond pavé setting throughout the filigree. A suspended gold bead (gundu) adds a traditional touch. Handmade by skilled artisans in Hyderabad known for their meticulous craftsmanship. Versatile design suitable for attaching to various chains or bead necklaces.
occasions: and contemporary celebrations. Pairs beautifully with traditional silk sarees or modern Indo-western attire.
description: A stunning blend of traditional Telugu design and modern elegance. The Mayura (peacock) symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and love, making it an auspicious piece for any occasion. The high-quality diamonds add brilliance and sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's richness and luster. This Adda will make a statement.
